Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to a child care leave credit for New York city uniformed correction officers who are members of the New York city uniformed correction/sanitation revised plan
Summary: Relates to a child care leave credit for New York city uniformed correction officers who are members of the New York city uniformed correction/sanitation revised plan.
LawCode: Amd ยง513, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to a child care leave credit for New York city uniformed correction officers who are members of the New York city uniformed correction/sanitation revised plan
